definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Pictures of insurgents firing an anti-aircraft missile in Iraq .
sentences.chinese: 有关伊拉克叛乱分子发射防空导弹的录像。

sentences.english: Learn how to draw tubes using perspective lines in this free video art lesson.
sentences.chinese: 学习如何绘制在这个自由录像艺术课使用透视线管。

sentences.english: It is an interactive video installation about Consumption preference and new experience of a perspective upon the basic unit of videos.

sentences.english: Actually, let me back up and do this in video.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，让我们倒退下然后在录像里做这个。

sentences.english: Mr. Trainum has become an advocate of videotaping entire interrogations.
sentences.chinese: 特娜姆先生支持对审讯进行全程录像。

sentences.english: The second video to be released by the name Makaveli is To Live and Die in L. A.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他们怎么可能拍到第二个录像时，他是“死”。

sentences.english: Also in the front row were the photographer and videographer.
sentences.chinese: 另外在前排就坐的还有摄影师和电视录像制作人。

sentences.english: It released a video of him in December.
sentences.chinese: 该组织于去年12月公布了他的一段视频录像。

sentences.english: And actually there is a video of this.
sentences.chinese: 关于这一情景他们有录像记录。

sentences.english: He preset the video recorder at the desired time.
sentences.chinese: 他按要求的时间预先把录像机调好。

sentences.english: It has guidance for consumer to choose and purchase digital video recorder.
sentences.chinese: 对广大用户选型购买数字录像机有一定指导意义。

sentences.english: All video equipment is on sale today and tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 所有录像设备今明两天降价出售。
